review: Madam is highly experienced as she detected my son's chronic illness within minutes.we are highly satisfied.she is more of a guardian than a doctor

Doctor treated my child very rudely while checking for infection in mouth. *** ****** *** **** ******* ********* *********** *** ******* ** * ****. ***** **** *** *********** ** ***** *** ********* *** ** *** **** *********. Plus they charged more than what is mentioned in practo. Not proffesional place and not at all friendly doctor

Doctor is always in a hurry. Since All docs are unavailable on a Sunday, had no option but to visit her twice. Once for my spouse and once for my daughter. 

She is always in a hurry; doesn't listen to what patients say. She doesn't let us complete the sentence. 

Wouldn't recommend.
Listens to our query and then carefully explains each and everything. Overall excellent pediatric doc !!

review: Dr.Banu is really good in quick diagnosis. And she suggests the ***** treatment and good explanation.

I highly recommend her , my son is now 10 years old and I always run to her from his second year and her friendly approach and detailed explanation always satisfies us best.

Only one thing is the fee amount in Apollo for specialists which I feel is too high
Doctor was warm and nice with the baby. She gave all details abt the questions asked and shared the detailed precaution to be taken with babies. She checked the reflex of the baby.
